title: Faulty client

embed.description: Grab seriously instant screenshots, screen GIFs, and webpage captures. Get the free app to streamline your visual sharing and bookmarking today.

body:
Umm, I was in a game and it loaded, then in game i couldn't click anything, no keyboard or mouse commands registered, so i restarted, but when it reloaded into the game I got the same thing.

So I restarted my computer and when it loads it says "Currently in game" but wont give me the reconnect option. then it just shows the screenshot...

Here is a GIF of the problem, it starts saying I'm in lobby whenever i log out then in again, then goes to gam ein progress but doesn't have a reconnect button. 

https://gyazo.com/fe999ef80d700233bd3cd9a32133e8a7

RIP Elo <3 ty for your time.

replies.body:
Try running a **client repair** through settings (the gear icon top right) > Initiate Full Repair.

If that doesn't fix your issue **submit a ticket** to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to help you further.
